Introduction
This topic contains information on the NSC burial allowance, including
general eligibility criteria for NSC burial allowance
payment amount for NSC burial allowance
referring a claim for NSC burial allowance to the rating activity
, and
NSC burial allowance and the transportation benefit
.
title: M21-1, Part XI, Subpart iii, Chapter 1, Section B  - Burial Benefits
citation: Part XI, Subpart iii, Chapter 1, Section B
